FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION INSTITUTIONALIZING THE ANCESTRAL DOMAIN SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT AND PROTECTION PLAN (ADSDPP) BY MANDATING ALL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND INSTRUMENTALITIES, INCLUDING LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS (LGUs), TO INCORPORATE THE ADSDPP INTO THEIR RESPECTIVE PROGRAMS, SERVICES AND ANNUAL BUDGET THERETO
